verses.verse: Yahweh<WH3068> called<WH7121> to Moses,<WH4872> and spoke<WH1696> to him out of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> saying,<WH559>

"Speak<WH1696> to the children<WH1121> of Israel,<WH3478> and tell<WH559> them,<WH120> 'When anyone of you offers<WH7126> an offering<WH7133> to Yahweh,<WH3068> you shall offer<WH7126> your offering<WH7133> of the livestock,<WH929> from the herd<WH1241> and from the flock.<WH6629>

<WH7133>"'If his offering is a burnt offering<WH5930> from the herd,<WH1241> he shall offer<WH7126> a male<WH2145> without blemish.<WH8549> He shall<WH7522> offer<WH7126> it at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting,<WH4150> that he may be accepted before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068>
He shall lay<WH5564> his hand<WH3027> on the head<WH7218> of the burnt offering,<WH5930> and it shall be accepted<WH7521> for him to make atonement for him.<WH3722>

He shall kill<WH7819> the bull<WH1121> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068> Aaron<WH175>'s sons,<WH1121> the priests,<WH3548> shall present<WH7126> the blood<WH1818> and sprinkle<WH2236> the blood<WH1818> around<WH5439> on the altar<WH4196> that is at the door<WH6607> of the Tent<WH168> of Meeting.<WH4150>
He shall flay<WH6584> the burnt offering,<WH5930> and cut<WH5408> it into pieces.<WH5409>
The sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> the priest<WH3548> shall put<WH5414> fire<WH784> on the altar,<WH4196> and lay wood<WH6086> in order<WH6186> on the fire;<WH784>

and Aaron<WH175>'s sons,<WH1121> the priests,<WH3548> shall lay<WH6186> the pieces,<WH7218> the head, and the fat<WH6309> in order<WH6186> on the wood<WH6086> that is on the fire<WH784> which is on the altar;<WH4196>

but its innards<WH7130> and its legs<WH3767> he shall wash<WH7364> with water.<WH4325> The priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> the whole on the altar,<WH4196> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> an offering made by fire,<WH801> of a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
<WH7133>"'If his offering is from the flock,<WH6629> from the sheep,<WH3775> or from the goats,<WH5795> for a burnt offering,<WH5930> he shall offer<WH7126> a male<WH2145> without blemish.<WH8549>

He shall kill<WH7819> it on the north<WH6828> side<WH3409> of the altar<WH4196> before<WH6440> Yahweh.<WH3068> Aaron<WH175>'s sons,<WH1121> the priests,<WH3548> shall sprinkle<WH2236> its blood<WH1818> around<WH5439> on the altar.<WH4196>

He shall cut<WH5408> it into its pieces,<WH5409> with its head<WH7218> and its fat.<WH6309> The priest<WH3548> shall lay them in order<WH6186> on the wood<WH6086> that is on the fire<WH784> which is on the altar,<WH4196>

but the innards<WH7130> and the legs<WH3767> he shall wash<WH7364> with water.<WH4325> The priest<WH3548> shall offer<WH7126> the whole,<WH6999> and burn it on the altar.<WH4196> It is a burnt offering,<WH5930> an offering made by fire,<WH801> of a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
<WH5930>"'If his offering to Yahweh<WH3068> is a burnt offering<WH5930> of birds,<WH5775> then he shall offer<WH7126> his offering<WH7133> of turtledoves,<WH8449> or of young<WH1121> pigeons.<WH3123>

The priest<WH3548> shall bring<WH7126> it to the altar,<WH4196> and wring off<WH4454> its head,<WH7218> and burn<WH6999> it on the altar;<WH4196> and its blood<WH1818> shall be drained out<WH4680> on the side<WH7023> of the altar;<WH4196>
and he shall take away<WH5493> its crop<WH4760> with its filth,<WH5133> and cast<WH7993> it beside<WH681> the altar<WH4196> on the east part,<WH6924> in the place<WH4725> of the ashes.<WH1880>

He shall tear<WH8156> it by its wings,<WH3671> but shall not divide it apart.<WH914> The priest<WH3548> shall burn<WH6999> it on the altar,<WH4196> on the wood<WH6086> that is on the fire.<WH784> It is a burnt offering,<WH5930> an offering made by fire,<WH801> of a pleasant<WH5207> aroma<WH7381> to Yahweh.<WH3068>
